metadata.title: o.d.m Men's SU101-4 3 Touch Digital Watch
features: Ion plated black stainless steel case
description: o.d.m. is a dynamic designer watch brand established in 1999. Our mission is to convey a philosophy that inspired the creation of the brand name: original, dynamic, and minimal. Early 2006, we re-established our position to an “inno-trendy timewear” brand, symbolizing our aim to adopt new technologies and design innovative ornamental wristwatches.

To build up a more distinctive orientation in the market, o.d.m. divides its products into two main lines: odm and o.d.m. original. odm is the more funky, futuristic, and trendy of the two, targeted for fashionable youths who are fond of bold, new, and advanced designs. Alternatively, o.d.m. original aims at meeting the demands of young executives (age ranges from 25 to 35) who are looking for something classy and unusual in the marketplace, thus this product line features simple yet sophisticated designs for the more mature and creative wearers.

In order to raise further recognition in different categories, we have developed an independent product design team, odm+, to handle collaboration programs with various brands and design units such as Coca-Cola, Looney Tunes, Astro Boy, Batman, Trexi, Jon Burgerman, Michael Young, Devilrobots, Tim Yap, and Jean Charles de Castelbajac.

As an international brand, we are proud to be the very first Hong Kong watch brand to participate in Baselworld in 2003. Since then we have been continuously taking part in this worldwide event along with other world class brand names. Another boost to our morale is our success in winning various international awards, including iF Design Award China, Germany’s Reddot Design Awards, USA’s Good Design Award, and Japan’s Good Design Awards. These accomplishments have further encouraged us to originate more creative designs.

The year 2007 was exceptional for o.d.m., the awards-winning DD99 spearheaded our global results, reaching more than 30 countries in distribution network. Currently we have three affiliate offices in Paris, Singapore, and China to assist our expanding trading market in the respective and neighboring countries, and have achieved remarkable success in regions including Asia Pacific, Europe, and South America.

From the success of last season's 3 Touch watch, a digital version has been designed for this season, using the same inspiring touch-screen technology. A red lens model has been added in this collection, like the all black model, when raging red is put together with the IP black watch case, it creates a vigorous aura and an eye-catching element for the users. The digital version presents a dynamic watch dial in the crown-less square case, boosting the uniqueness and masculinity to the extreme.

title: o.d.m Men's SU101-4 3 Touch Digital Watch
